My interest in technology began in 2022, and since then, Iâ€™ve fully immersed myself in this world, always seeking new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer. Besides coding, I enjoy exploring new places, trying out different recipes, and binge-watching movies and series.

futebol-clube.description: Informative website about soccer matches and standings. Developed an API using the TDD methodology, and the applications were integrated through Docker Compose to interact with a database.

atelier-couture.description: A fashion website created for a tailoring atelier, developed with TypeScript, Sass, React, and Django. The site is responsive and includes a login page with roles and a dashboard for monitoring orders and customer data.

data-scraper.description: This project scrapes data from the ANS website, downloads PDF files, extracts relevant information into CSV format, saves everything in the database, and displays it in a simple and functional interface. It also includes a search field to facilitate data navigation.
